si.title: රවී කරුනානායකගේ නිවාස ආරක්ෂාව
body_lines: ජාතික ආසනය රත් කිරීමෙන් පසු රවී කරුනානායකගේ නිවස ශක්තිමත් වී තිබේ.

en.title: Ravi Karunanayake's home security
body_lines: Ravi Karunanayake's house has been strengthened after the issue of national seat has been heated.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of Ravi Karunanayake's home security in 200 characters:
Ravi Karunanayake's residence enhanced security measures implemented due to intense political controversy surrounding his national seat.
